sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: CMV enhancer
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: human cytomegalovirus immediate early enhancer; contains an 18-bp deletion relative to the standard CMV enhancer
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: CMV enhancer

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refMethod: pAVPR2_TCS(Q’L)_HA-dCas9(N)_P2A-Puro-WPRE was a gift from Tudor Fulga (Addgene plasmid # 101112 ; http://n2t.net/addgene:101112 ; RRID:Addgene_101112)

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: Puro-R
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: Puro-R
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Puromycin resistance gene, reverse primer. Also called puro-variant-R

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: P2A
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: P2A
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Eukaryotic ribosomes fail to insert a peptide bond between the Gly and Pro residues, yielding separate polypeptides.

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: dCas9(N)
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: dCas9(N)
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:product: N-terminal portion of catalytically inactive Streptococcus pyogenes dCas9 carrying the D10A mutation (Zetsche et al., 2015)

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: f1 ori
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: f1 ori
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: f1 bacteriophage origin of replication; arrow indicates direction of (+) strand synthesis

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: hybrid intron
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: hybrid intron
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: hybrid between chicken beta-actin (CBA) and minute virus of mice (MMV) introns (Gray et al., 2011)

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: pBRforEco
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: pBRforEco
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: pBR322 vectors, upsteam of EcoRI site, forward primer

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: AmpR
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: confers resistance to ampicillin, carbenicillin, and related antibiotics
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: AmpR

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:modificationsToBackbone: The AVPR2 coding sequence was cloned from plasmid AVPR2-Tango (gift from Bryan Roth (Addgene plasmid #66227)) and replaced with BDKRB2 in pBDKRB2_TCS(Q’L)_HA-dCas9( N)_P2A-Puro-WPRE.

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: AAV2 ITR
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: AAV2 ITR
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: inverted terminal repeat of adeno-associated virus serotype 2

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:aPortionOfThisPlasmidWasDerivedF: Plasmid AVPR2-Tango (gift from Bryan Roth, Addgene plasmid #66227); pBDKRB2_TCS(Q’L)_HA-dCas9( N)_P2A-Puro-WPRE.

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:product: Factor Xa recognition and cleavage site
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: Factor Xa site
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: Factor Xa site
BGH-rev
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: BGH-rev
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Bovine growth hormone terminator, reverse primer. Also called BGH reverse

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refBib: Engineering Synthetic Signaling Pathways with Programmable dCas9-Based Chimeric Receptors. Baeumler TA, Ahmed AA, Fulga TA. Cell Rep. 2017 Sep 12;20(11):2639-2653. doi: 10.1016/j.celrep.2017.08.044. 10.1016/j.celrep.2017.08.044 PubMed 28903044

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: pRS-marker
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: pRS-marker
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: pRS vectors, use to sequence yeast selectable marker
